title: AspectDef
description: Definition of an aspect type within the Cheap data model

name.description: The unique name identifier for this aspect definition

globalId.description: The globally unique identifier for this aspect definition

propertyDefs.description: All property definitions that belong to this aspect

isReadable.description: Whether aspects of this type can be read

isWritable.description: Whether aspects of this type can be written or modified

canAddProperties.description: Whether new properties can be dynamically added to aspects of this type

canRemoveProperties.description: Whether properties can be dynamically removed from aspects of this type
